title: Welcome to my universe!
paragraph: Hi there! I'm AJ. I'm a Data Scientist who is fresh out of university. I graduated my BScHons Computer Science at Stellenbosch University with Cum Laude in 2024 . Because of my studies, I am a proficient programmer, problem solver and have a good grasp of mathematics. Outside of my studies, I used to sing in my university's choir, and I also work on various personal projects which include programming related projects (like this website!), independent research, as well as some more "artsy" things like poetry.
